directions: Combine zucchini, eggplant, onions, tomatoes, bell peppers, garlic, vegetable broth, olive oil, salt, pepper, thyme, and oregano together in a slow cooker. Cover.
Cook on High heat until vegetables are tender and cooked down, about 4 hours, or on Low heat for about 8 hours.
ingredients: 6 medium zucchini, halved lengthwise and sliced
title: Ratatouille in the Slow Cooker
